award_title: Collaborative Research: III: Medium: Advancing Large Language Model Unlearning: Foundations and Applications
subject: unlearning benchmarks and the artifact graveyard
body:
Hi Oluwasanmi,

Your work on LLM unlearning—especially the interpretability-driven weight identification and benchmark development—sits in that frustrating zone where the methods matter but the artifacts tend to rot on GitHub within a year.

I built Ouro after hitting this wall myself. Ouro helps researchers share computational tools and datasets in a way that's actually usable and durable, rather than a zip file buried in supplementary materials.

Given you're releasing algorithms and benchmarks across optimization, model, and data layers, figured it might be relevant.

I can set up access for your lab if you want to take a glance.

Hope you get some actual rest over winter break—happy holidays.

Cheers,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
